talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the jail.


Even though you have special permission
to be in Gerudo Town, I still won't let you
past this point.
Really, the only way into jail is to <clr:0000>break
our rules<clr:ffff>.

Voe are normally not allowed inside our
town—the one in jail broke that rule, so
he's locked up.
And, even though you have permission
to be here, if you break the rules...

you'll join him in jail.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I already told you that's the jail cell.
The only way to end up in there is by
<clr:0000>breaking the rules<clr:ffff> of Gerudo Town!
Voe are normally not allowed inside
Gerudo Town—the one in jail broke that
rule, so he's locked up.
And, even though you have permission
to be here, if you break the rules of
Gerudo Town...
You'll join him in jail.
talk0011:
Wait...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_00>Now that I look closely... You're the
voe from before!

<sp:3:0:2:0200>Do you realize you're dressed like a
member of a group that intends us harm?

You'd put fear into many people here if
you went around dressed like that, even
though we know you aren't one of them.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>So if you want out of there, you'll need to
change your clothes first!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>I will admit you are now wearing more
clothing, but... Do you realize that is the
outfit of a group that intends us harm?
Even though we know you aren't one of
them, you'd scare many people here if
you went around dressed like that.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>So if you want out of there, you'll need to
change into something else first!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Everyone has gone back into town, but
I'm stuck here on guard duty, keeping
watch on this voe.
Ugh, stupid voe...
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Painful_00>You...<sp:5:0:0>


Do you realize you're dressed like a
member of a group that intends us harm?

You'd put fear into many people here if
you went around dressed like that!

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>So if you want out of there, you'll need to
change your clothes first!
talk0003:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wh—<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00> How'd you get in there?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>That's obviously a jail cell, not a place
for visitors!

Only <clr:0000>prisoners<clr:ffff> are supposed to be in
there—like that voe who tried to get
into town!
But you... You're the chief's guest,
aren't you?

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Painful_00>The fact that you got in there, on purpose
or by accident, without me knowing would
be embarrassing, so...
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Get out of there before anyone sees you!<sp:5:0:0>
Come on!
talk0013:
<snd:Angry_01>Hey, voe! <sp:5:1:0>You can't just walk around
like that!
talk0004:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Wh— Again?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>How do you keep getting in there?
Some kind of secret tunnel? No, it
isn't possible.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Get out of there before anyone sees you!<sp:5:0:0>
Come on!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_00>I know the desert is hot, but it's not
that hot!

Put more clothes on!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hope you've realized that it's better to
behave yourself... And in any case, the
captain sent word to let you out.
But I'd better not see your rule-breaking
face here again!
talk0015:
...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>I am not going to speak with you until you
put more clothes on.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Had enough time to think about what you
did to end up here?<sp:5:0:0> I hope so, since the
captain sent word to let you out.
But I'd better not see your rule-breaking
face here again! Nobody likes a voe
who can't take a hint!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>It might be hot out, but you can't just
walk around like that. Put some clothes
on before you come into town, OK?
talk0007:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wh— You... How'd you get...<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Well... OK. That's fine. The captain sent
word to let you out, anyway.

Just don't do anything to get thrown back
in there!
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>You... Aren't you cold?<sp:5:0:0> I'd be freezing...
At any rate, could you put some clothes
on before coming into town?
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You scoundrel! Breaking our laws... Maybe
a little time in there will do you good.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Listen, I know you're a special voe, but
that doesn't mean you can do whatever
you want.
If you're planning on coming into town,
you're going to have to put some clothes
on first!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You just don't learn, do you?


I don't show mercy to anyone who breaks
the rules, chief's guest or not!

Take some time to think about how rules
exist for a reason.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>It doesn't matter who you are—I will not
let you pass looking like that!

If you want to come into town, you're
going to have to put some clothes on!
